name: DGCP | MaMeeFarm™ — Proof 431  Recording Emptiness and Daily Cleaning at Duck Shelter
description:
This proof documents a daily routine at the duck shelter of MaMeeFarm™, recorded on
2026-01-03 at 07:41 (Asia/Bangkok).

The activity reflects entering the duck shelter despite the absence of ducks, recording the physical emptiness of the space, and performing routine cleaning as part of ongoing farm maintenance.

The record demonstrates continuity of responsibility and care, even when production or livestock is temporarily absent.
No staging, reenactment, or modification was performed.

This proof is preserved under the DGCP (Data Governance & Continuous Proof) system as verifiable evidence of real-life, daily farm work.
